com.invoices.controller

Class UpdateController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.invoices.controller.UpdateController

  • public class UpdateController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a controller responsible for managing the HTTP requests about invoice updates. Updates made to an invoice, will be automatically propagated to all the respective tables in the database, by using "Cascading" of the Hibernate framework.
    Author:
    psoutzis, email: soutzis.petros@gmail.com

    • Method Detail

      • findToUpdate

        public java.lang.String findToUpdate(java.lang.String id,
                                     Model model)
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the invoice to update.
        model - is the model that will hold data to be displayed by the view
        Returns:
        the page where the user will make their invoice-changes at WARNING: Html and JavaScript code depends on the NAMING of MODEL VARIABLES. Renaming could lead to bugs.

      • executeUpdate

        public void executeUpdate(UpdateInvoiceDTO dto)
        Method that listens for the HTTP request to apply the selected updates
        Parameters:
        dto - a Data Transfer Object (DTO) to hold all data relevant to the incoming update request.
